sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When this weapon scores a critical injury or hit, the character adds ten times the Vicious rating to the critical roll. With Vicious 3, for example, the victim adds + 30 to his critical hit result.</description> <name>Vicious (Passive)</name> <number>WQ0001028</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:15:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>765068a82fd46450e0f497eef699b671</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:15:12</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
